entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
